family_info_id = #{familyInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
account_record_type = #{accountRecordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update family_account_record set family_info_id = #{familyInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_record_type = #{accountRecordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_user_id = #{memberUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_record_amount = #{accountRecordAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, account_record_year = #{accountRecordYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_record_month = #{accountRecordMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_record_day = #{accountRecordDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_record_desc = #{accountRecordDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_create_by = #{firstCreateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_create_date = #{firstCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_divide_id = #{dataDivideId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where account_record_id = #{accountRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT d.family_member_type AS familyMemberType, c.system_user_nickname AS systemUserNickname, b.family_info_name AS familyInfoName, a.account_record_id AS accountRecordId, a.family_info_id AS familyInfoId, a.account_record_type AS accountRecordType, a.member_user_id AS memberUserId, a.account_record_amount AS accountRecordAmount, a.account_record_year AS accountRecordYear, a.account_record_month AS accountRecordMonth, a.account_record_day AS accountRecordDay, a.account_record_desc AS accountRecordDesc, a.first_create_by AS firstCreateBy, a.first_create_date AS firstCreateDate, a.data_status AS dataStatus, a.data_divide_id AS dataDivideId, a.description AS description, a.last_update_by AS lastUpdateBy, a.last_update_date AS lastUpdateDate FROM family_account_record a JOIN family_info b ON a.family_info_id = b.family_info_id JOIN system_user_info c ON a.member_user_id = c.system_user_id JOIN family_member d ON a.member_user_id = d.member_user_id
a.data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.account_record_year = #{accountRecordYear,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.account_record_month = #{accountRecordMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.account_record_day = #{accountRecordDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.family_info_name like CONCAT('%', #{familyInfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY a.first_create_date DESC
